alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 07 at 5:49PM EDT until May 07 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR CENTRAL WAKE COUNTY... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated that the persistent area of showers and thunderstorms over south Raleigh produced between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of locally heavy rain. While the heavy rain has shifted south of the area, run-off will continue, especially in areas where creeks and streams are running near or over bankful. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Raleigh and Cary. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
